channel.title: Donate system problem
channel.description:
I followed this tutorial : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509046.msg3693035.html#msg3693035
I extracted the files in filemanager at 000webhost,, but it still gives an error when I try to load the page.
this is in db.php :
[code]<?php // MYSQL $conn = mysql_connect("localhost", "a9735761_ssvote", "(mypassword)"); mysql_select_db('a9735761_vote', $conn); ?> [/code]
[code]» MySQL Database » MySQL User » MySQL Host a9735761_donate a9735761_donate mysql15.000webhost.com[/code]
And that is my MYSQL..
well it says i have to go to MySQL remote to set the ips,, but I cant find that remote...
it gives this error : http://error404.000webhost.com/?
It just doesnt load right :(
please help :(

item.title: Donate system problem
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

Check $conn to see if it’s even online:-

if ($conn) { //something }

Also 000webhosts gives you a specific URL to use instead of ‘localhost’…

Read full topic

item.title: Donate system problem
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I followed this tutorial : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509046.msg3693035.html#msg3693035

I extracted the files in filemanager at 000webhost, but it still gives an error when I try to load the page.

this is in db.php :

<?php // MYSQL $conn = mysql_connect("localhost", "a9735761_ssvote", "(mypassword)"); mysql_select_db('a9735761_vote', $conn); ?>

» MySQL Database » MySQL User » MySQL Host a9735761_donate a9735761_donate mysql15.000webhost.com

And that is my MYSQL…

well it says i have to go to MySQL remote to set the ips, but I cant find that remote…

it gives this error : http://error404.000webhost.com/?

It just doesnt load right

please help

Read full topic
